title: Bobby Marks, Howard Beck, and Jeff Van Gundy
description:
Zach and ESPN's Bobby Marks and Howard Beck of Sports Illustrated talk Philadelphia's James Harden problem, Bucks-Celtics, Golden State-Memphis, Giannis taking the "best player" throne, and more. Then Jeff Van Gundy joins to preview Suns-Mavs Game 7.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
